comments.body:
We already have phantoms that attack you when you don't sleep enough, and why would a mole have any interest in attacking you? Maybe something like this could happen in hard mode where zombies could dig you out, but leave my normal and easy alone!

 

You might want to add this idea to another post about "extreme mode". The poster had also thought that hard mode wasn't hard enough, so they thought of making Mobs with better AI that could make the game very difficult but also thrilling! It's called "Harder Minecraft Mode" if you are interested!

Here's the post: https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/360048097932-Harder-Minecraft-Mode ,

battlerifle10 shared the thread.
This would be awesome! It would definitely be a cool feature that would add a lot more life to mineshafts and Strongholds.
Also make half of them throw rocks and half use clubs. Rocks do a bit less damage than clubs
Horned Sheep from Minecraft Earth?
I would say that there should have to be a limit for the player to have a certain amount of these totems though. Like 3-5.
This should also not affect the mini boss and boss mobs.
The totems shouldn't make them not attack you, it should make them weaker and slower though.

I agree with Blast Burner that they should be limited in number. Prehaps they could be yielded one at a time,  made hard to obtain, and don't overlap with current features (potions,eytra,enchantments,etc).
Halloween idea!
Very scary update II: electric boogaloo
Loving it!! But if you didn't have a friend playing with you, would it copy your skin?
Sure. Like an undead ocean biome perhaps?
Yeah I think that would be a great idea like a dead coral reef
Ksixjxj
Nice suggestion, it seems like stone talus from botw but I would spawn tons of them
Sorry but early wings for the player are too op.
I really like the idea of making bats more useful and you said they would be bad compared to the elytra which is great too but it would be cool if you could specify what they do exactly
I was just thinking about this but you beat me to it, I do think it is a good idea.  However, I think some sort of flying should be possible, just make it slower and harder to control.
Yeah, I would definitely want more birds in the game, I just wanted to get as much detail as possible so I only included one
Пожалуйста прочтите это и исполнит, будет классно.
здравствуй разработчик этих мобов пожалуйста сделай мобо Санса сделай там чтобы он злился у него глаз светился чтобы эти кости летали его эти как их турели летали

Неплохо, но будет как-то легко после победы над ним. А как насчет моба под названием Лодон. Будет существовать три вида этого моба (как пауков): тот, который будет жить в море и на его берегах , тот, который будет жить на горах и парить на крыльях вниз к подножию. Про третий чуть позже. Эти два вида будут враждебными, их детенышей можно приручить с помощью водорослей (морских) и с помощью яблок (горных) . Он будет больше игрока, но прирученный будет выростать чуть меньше и слабее. Сносить он будет 8 едениц xp и у него будет мех, который действует как броня, поэтому можно будет стричь домашних для получения брони. Рядом с ним будет накладываться эффект слабости и новый эффект обледенения, замедляющий игрока и отнимающий со временем по 1 еденице xp. Но от этих эффектов можно будет спастись в броне из меха Лодона. А если надеть его голову, то сможешь видеть где находится Лодон и они не будут атаковать игрока. Мех Лодона будет зеленым и постепенно будет становиться красным по направлению к хвосту. Ходить он будет на двух задних лапах , передвигаться быстро (морской будут ещё плавать, а горный парить как на элитрах) . Последний вид будет чуть ниже других Лодонов и будет дружелюбным. При убийстве будет выподать мех и капли яда, который будет переделываться в зелье холода с эффектами, которые накладывает мою. Грибной Лодон ещё будет обрастать грибами, его можно доить и получать молоко с эффектом исцеления, он будет жить на грибном острове и из него можно получить исцеляющее мясо.
I Want to game the dragon not kill it, but other wise, good I like the idea
Tame

Post moved to mobs category, as nearly the entire post is about that, and the biome itself is a tiny mention.

Moved to proper category.

Clarified subject to help search results.

Here's a great post that may help you narrow your thoughts down AND make a great Biome and Dimensions post: https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360025050211-How-To-Make-a-brand-new-Biome-or-Dimension-

Thanks for your contribution.
Great idea! I’m a huge sheep fan.

Clarified subject to help search results.

Thanks for your contribution.
Wandering traders should bring a few extra llamas to trade fore.
I do believe they have implemented this already since I stole both the traders llamas 3 days ago and they are still in my village.
But not stealing the llamas, actually trade for them.

This idea will make the lore in MInecraft much better as the addition of a cult and maybe a boss that comes along with it.

=D
Well i think more 'humanish' mobs are cool i think we should stick to them being villager like, perhaps they could be a new kind of pillager?
The cult should be about worshipping endermen. I like the idea a Minecraft having Lovecraftian elements.

Interesting idea. I had a similar one where the cultists worship a sort of golem god or demon, or are attempting to build the redstone monstrosity from Minecraft Dungeons. I think this could also add a lot more lore to the Pillagers and Evokers. The shrines being underground would also make cave exploration very interesting (i.e. the shrines spawning on the outskirts of strongholds, periodically in mineshafts or even just in shallow areas beneath certain biomes). Perhaps killing the cultists gives an item that when placed in a specific structure in the shrine spawns the boss mob the cultists are worshiping. I really like the idea of having to find a structure or ruin where using an artifact can spawn a boss (terarria does this multiple times). Perhaps it drops an item that allows the player to use magic a little more easily, like a forbidden evoker tome or a fragment of some ancient arcane machine.
cultist would be a very well fit in ancient cities, they should be another kind of pillager this will increase the creeps in the ancient cities
I feel like the spawn chance is too rare, how about one spawns once you light the nether portal. It. An still spawn from the lightning vex, but gives a tiny bit more context.
Thanks for the advice Some Animal
That’s right, but the Illusioner doesn’t exist right now. Mojang can you please add the Illusioner back into Minecraft?

And mansions!

They spawn more often than evokers but less common than vindicators
Chickens already spawn in Minecraft jungles, so there's no need for this mob to be added. I'm just saying.

This was more extreme than I thought it would be.
I'm okay with most of it, but I would prefer attack damage and health to be a bit lower, maybe 2 or rarely 3 hits to die without armour, for the tier 1 mobs, or with iron for the tier 2 mobs, or with diamond for the tier 3 mobs, and without armour tier 2 and tier 3 can 1 hit kill a player, and tier 3 can 1 hit kill with iron.
Also, the health should probably be double what it is in regular mode.
Otherwise, it seems unplayable, bearing in mind the time it takes to get enchanted diamond armour and tools.

This seems hard enough for hardcore mode in my opinion.

That sounds a little bit more reasonable.  The reason I proposed such an extreme change is because I want Minecraft to feel like a survival game in hardcore mode, not merely a cheap imitation of hard mode (which itself is actually creative mode, except you have to collect resources and avoid death, the first of which is the real challenge).  In order to do that, I decided that making it a bit more realistic might be fun, and in real life you would usually be killed by a single arrow.  I guess you might be able to escape with a wound, though.

I´m ok with no bed existing in hardcore mode, but I do not think that changing the mob health and damage values will do any good - simply because the player learns in non-hardcore mode, hard mode, how to defeat them, and has a certain expectation of the mobs damage and behavior. TheIronSniper´s idea is a better variant, too, beacuse the players health is visible to the player, but the enemies health and damage is not.

Instead, I would recommend to make it harder to obtain blocks to build the first "hut": Instead of being able to "cut" down trees with the fist, a player would injure himself by 1/2 heart when trying. He would first have to gain sticks from the leaves, and the sticks amount when used on the hotbar would be like their durability: It would take about 10 sticks to "cut" a piece of lumber from a tree. This and more methods alike would make it very hard to obtain blocks. Another method would be the player to be unable to obtain dirt by hand, he would have to use a shovel, a wooden shovel would break after taking 2 blocks, a stone shovel would break after 5 uses. Same for mining with wooden / stone pickaxes etc.

Also, "standing still" would still increase the hunger bar, which it currently doesn´t, not even on hard mode. A player could not go afk any more in hardcore, true, but the reason for this is that players could "trap" themselves in holes because they do not have the "fist" block breaking of any block any more and should still have a way to die.

Last but not least, food would grow much slower, they player would be forced to find bonemeal.

I like your thinking! My only criticism is how hard you say mobs would hit, and their health. I think they should hit hard, but one, or even two hits should not be a death sentence. Giving wither skeletons as much health as the ender dragon also seems extreme; I think a better number would be as much health as the player.

I think that maybe In hardcore phantoms should spawn naturally at night they wouldn't be too common but still. I also think that mobs like skeletons spiders zombies or whatever should have a bit of a speed buff so that they can keep up with the players sprinting.
I'm glad someone stated that hardcore isn't very hardcore, but this is a little overkill don't you think?

Add hardcore to bedrock first.  You think bedrock is a cheap imitation, right?  Java is better than bedrock in some ways, but the people who play it are the ones who matter, and you are a java player, and act horrible to bedrock, so bedrock will always be better.
Makes sense. Maybe iron golems should have the same effect when 8 blocks away from iron-type blocks (Iron ore, iron blocks, anvils, ect.)
umm wuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuut
umm wuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuut
This is actually a great idea! I love it :D
Feature for mob, not biome, so moving to proper category.

Well I do think this is 'neat' it would mean they don't burn in the day, I guess they could 'teleport to the end' (despawn with partical effects) otherwise it's a sorta Atmosphere change, and with the state of things I believe they should focuse on things that effect the game more directly when adding features
